title: "Cejoy" compressed modern serif
content:
Can anyone tell me what font this is? Thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [C\_JOY.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185646/http:/typophile.com/files/C_JOY.jpg) | 26.91 KB |
author: yuribollaerts

comments.content:
Except for the C, this looks a lot like [Spire](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185646/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dsgnhaus/spire/). (edit: the C looks more like a compressed Bodoni, but the J matches Spire better).

- Mike Yanega

Yep, that looks quite a bit like me.

(The <cite>O</cite> is different too.)
